reviews.review_msg: I love coming and reading the ratings here. It's hilarious. "Dogmatic and self-important"? "Pompous know it all"? Please. His material is not to make himself feel superior. IT'S TO MAKE YOU LEARN. COMPLETELY learn. If you're lazy, find a different prof. If you're in Brad Bart's class and have trouble, GET HELP! Don't sit there and **** afterwards.
